name: La-Mulana 2
blurb: The direct sequel to the cult 2D side scrolling action adventure hit, La-Mulana, developed by its original creators: NIGORO.

rewards.reward: No Reward

INITIATE (EARLY BIRD SPECIAL)\r\n==============================\r\nYou get both the Steam version and a DRM-free digital copy of La-Mulana 2 from Playism upon release. (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

INITIATE ============================== \r\nYou get both the Steam version and a DRM-free digital copy of La-Mulana 2 from Playism upon release. (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

LOCKSMITH ============================== You get one in-game skeleton key to unlock one of Lumisa's unique hidden costumes in La-Mulana 2, a Kickstarter-exclusive desktop wallpaper, a place on the official La-Mulana 2 Thank You page, access to the official Backer forum, "The Kosugi Archaeological Society", and all tier rewards above. (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

KEYMASTER ============================== You get another skeleton key to unlock 1 more unique hidden costume for Lumisa, the La-Mulana 2 digital soundtrack, and all above tier rewards. (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

EXPLORER (EARLY BIRD SPECIAL) ============================== Become a part of the development team with access to the alpha version during development, as well as access to the alpha forum, where you'll leave your feedback and help shape the final version of La-Mulana 2. You will also get four skeleton keys to unlock four unique hidden costumes for Lumisa in La-Mulana 2. All above tier rewards included. (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

EXPLORER ============================== Become a part of the development team with access to the alpha version during development, as well as access to the alpha forum, where you'll leave your feedback and help shape the final version of La-Mulana 2. You will also get four skeleton keys to unlock four unique hidden costumes for Lumisa in La-Mulana 2. All above tier rewards included. (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

RESEARCHER ============================== The La-Mulana Digital Set! You get the La-Mulana 2 Digital Soundtrack, The Digital Artbook, and all above rewards. (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

ASSISTANT PROFESSOR ============================== The Legacy  Set! You get La-Mulana 1, the La-Mulana 1 Digital Soundtrack, the La-Mulana 1 Digital Artbook, and all above rewards! (A free Playism account is required to download digital backer rewards)

PROFESSOR ============================== The packaged deal! You get the physical packaged version of La-Mulana 2 with instruction manual, 1 of 8 pieces of a one-of-a-kind drawing by director Takumi Naramura. Perhaps bringing all 8 pieces together might solve the mystery of the ruins? For backers outside of Japan, please include an extra $15 for shipping. (includes all previous rewards)

PROFESSOR ==============================\r\nThe packaged deal! You get the physical packaged version of La-Mulana 2 with instruction manual. For backers outside of Japan, please include an extra $15 for shipping. (includes all previous rewards)

BOXER ============================== Show your love of NIGORO off to the world! You get a never-before-made physical boxed copy of La-Mulana 1 with instruction manual. For backers outside of Japan, please include an extra $20 for shipping. (includes all previous rewards)

TWO FIFTY-SIX PLUS ============================== You get a one-of-a-kind original sketch of your favorite La-Mulana character drawn by director Takumi Naramura himself. You will also get a printed version of the La-Mulana 1 & 2 artbooks, along with a digital version of the Ultra hard 'one-hit-kill' edition of La-Mulana 1. For orders outside Japan, please include an extra $25 for shipping. (includes all previous rewards)

TWO FIFTY-SIX ============================== \r\nYou get a printed version of the La-Mulana 1 & 2 artbooks, along with a digital version of the Ultra hard 'one-hit-kill' edition of La-Mulana 1. For orders outside Japan, please include an extra $25 for shipping. (includes all previous rewards)

SKELETON PLUS ============================== Be a part of the adventure! Become a skeleton in the ruins of Eg-Lana. The skeleton will bear your name, and your choice of last words. You will also get a personalized sketch of the character of your choice (drawn by Takumi Naramura), and a Kickstarter original La-Mulana themed t-shirt. For backers outside Japan, please include $30 extra for shipping. (includes the TWO FIFTY-SIX tier rewards)

SKELETON ==============================   Be a part of the adventure! Become a skeleton in the ruins of Eg-Lana. The skeleton will bear your name, and your choice of last words. You will also get a Kickstarter original La-Mulana themed t-shirt. For backers outside Japan, please include $30 extra for shipping. (includes TWO FIFTY-SIX tier rewards)

ARCHITECT ============================== Be immortalized by becoming a part of one of La-Mulana 2's unique sprite-art frescos that line the walls of the ruins! For backers outside of Japan, please include an extra $30 for shipping. (includes the TWO FIFTY-SIX tier rewards)

GUARDIAN ============================== Help NIGORO choose one of the many mini-bosses that will appear in La-Mulana 2 from a list of potential bosses, and help the team design their attacks. For backers outside Japan, please include an extra $30 for shipping. (Includes TWO FIFTY-SIX tier rewards)

TRAP MASTER\r\n============================== Get creatively evil! Join NIGORO in a planning meeting to help design one of La-Mulana 2's nefarious and fatal traps! You also get the TWO FIFTY-SIX tier rewards. For backers outside of Japan, please include an extra $30 for shipping.

MERCHANT ============================== Help Lumisa on her journey through the ruins! We will name one of La-Mulana 2's intrepid shopkeepers after you! You'll also get the TWO FIFTY-SIX tier rewards. For backers outside of Japan, please include an extra $30 for shipping.

LUMISA ============================== You will get a limited edition Lumisa figure to watch over your room or office, along with all of the MERCHANT tier rewards. For backers outside Japan, please include an extra $30 for shipping.

MULBRUK ============================== You will get a limited edition Mulbruk figure to watch over you, along with all of the LUMISA tier rewards. For backers outside Japan, please include an extra $30 for shipping.

NIGORO TEAM MEMBER ============================== Come join us for the release party for La-Mulana 2! You will be a guest of honor and forever regarded as a member of the NIGORO team. You will also get the MULBRUK tier rewards. For backers outside Japan, please include an extra $30 for shipping. (Travel and accommodations not included)
